attributes.action: change the logo of the 2012 Olympic games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The logo for the 2012 London Olympic games was unveiled recently. The logo is an embarrassment, to British culture and identity - it is ugly and old fashioned. The 2012 games should show the world what the British can achieve and should display to the world both what British hospitality is like and it should be something great for our nation.

How can it be when the logo is an embarrassment and casts a cloud over the whole event?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
